sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Infrastructure Development Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Infrastructure Development Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Rules. The State Treasurer may adopt rules necessary to implement this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The State Treasurer may adopt rules necessary to implement this Act.

sections.heading: Infrastructure Development Fund
sections.text: The Infrastructure Development Fund is created as a non-appropriated trust fund within the State treasury, which may receive a portion of earnings from the Infrastructure Development Account and may be used by the State Treasurer to pay expenses related to this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
